![](https://framaforms.org/sites/default/files/forms/img/both_0.png)

This survey aims to better know the users of the two R packages COGugaison and CARTElette, which make possible to manage the evolution of administrative divisions over time in France, in databases and map layers. 

Thank you very much for your participation which will contribute to the improvement of these packages!
